ref: 5237 jīrṇá ʻ old, worn -- out ʼ AV., ʻ digested ʼ MBh. [~ *jhīrṇa -- . -- &rcirclemacr Pa. jiṇṇa -- , ˚aka -- ʻ decayed, decrepit, frail ʼ; Pk. jiṇṇa<-> ʻ old, worn -- out, digested ʼ; Ku. jino ʻ old, shrivelled, stiff ʼ, jiniṇo ʻ to become shrivelled ʼ; A. zīn ʻ worn -- out, digested ʼ; B. jīna ʻ old, worn -- out ʼ; Or. jīna ʻ very old, dilapidated ʼ; H. jīn ʻ old ʼ, m. ʻ old man ʼ; OSi. jiṇa ʻ decayed ʼ, Si. duṇu (< jiṇ + ū < bhūtá -- ).
